italic.text: To embark units on a position to transport them.

line.text: In Sword, to offer the embarking of units by an agent on an embarking position. This mission is used to coordinate the troops and vehicules transportation (see transportation capabilities in authoring tool), when SWORD is connected to other simulations through an HLA federation.
Lines used by units to adapt their behavior when they reach or cross them.
Right or left boundaries inside which the agent perform the mission.
Right or left boundaries inside which the agent perform the mission.

The agent moves toward the given position. If it is not reachable (a urban block inside which the agent cannot move for instance), the agent moves as close as possible, else it moves to the center of the position. Average speed depends on the physical capabilities regarding the terrain properties.
Upon reaching the position, the agent is ready to embark.
The mission ends once the agent has embarked the units.
